Trustee_0.name: Liam OConnor
Trustee_0.content: Throughout the transaction with Nadia Novak, I effectively executed the agreed allocation plan, securing a commendable 40% profit while ensuring significant returns for the investor. I maintained transparency and reliability, showcasing my competence and pro-social behavior. My ability to adhere to previous commitments and navigate investment challenges has reinforced my reputation as a pragmatic trustee. My track record of no rejections emphasizes my reliability and strengthens my standing in the investment community.

Investor_16.name: Robert Miller
Investor_16.content: The investor displayed a willingness to engage in a mutually beneficial transaction by accepting the proposed allocation plan, indicating some trust. However, since this was their first interaction, their reputation remains unformed and may evolve in future transactions based on the outcomes of their investments.

Investor_8.name: Nadia Novak
Investor_8.content: Nadia Novak displayed openness and willingness to participate in the investment despite her lack of previous experience. Her acceptance of the agreed profit distribution suggests a foundational understanding of the investment process. While she achieved a decent return, her familiarity with investment norms and negotiation tactics needs improvement for enhanced outcomes in future collaborations. This indicates a neutral but potential reputation, with room for growth in her confidence and understanding of investment mechanisms.
